prompt: <description>Part 1: Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with rounded corners. Create the first face of the sketch with the following loops and lines: 1.1. Extrude depth towards normal: 0.5 1.3. Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0 1.4. Sketch scale: 0.75 1.5. Operation: Create a new solid body. Part 2: Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with parallel sides and a flat top and bottom. Create a new coordinate system with euler angles of [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and translation vector of [0.25, 0.0, 0.1667]. Create the first face of the sketch with the following loops and lines: 2.1. Loop 1 with 4 lines: * Line 1: Start point [0.0, 0.0], end point [0.25, 0.0] * Line 2: Start point [0.25, 0.0], end point [0.25, 0.3333] * Line 3: Start point [0.25, 0.3333], end point [0.0, 0.3333] * Line 4: Start point [0.0, 0.3333], end point [0.0, 0.0] Extrude the sketch with the following parameters: 2.2. Extrude depth towards normal: 0.0 2.3. Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.1667 2.4. Sketch scale: 0.3333 2.5. Operation: Cut the existing solid body. Part 3: Construct a three-dimensional geometric shape with a rectangular base and a triangular top, connected by a straight line. Create a new coordinate system with euler angles of [-90.0, 0.0, -90.0] and translation vector of [0.75, 0.1667, 0.1667]. Create the first face of the sketch with the following loops and lines: 3.1. Loop 1 with 4 lines: * Line 1: Start point [0.0, 0.0], end point [0.1667, 0.0] * Line 2: Start point [0.1667, 0.0], end point [0.1667, 0.1667] * Line 3: Start point [0.1667, 0.1667], end point [0.0, 0.1667] * Line 4: Start point [0.0, 0.1667], end point [0.0, 0.0] Extrude the sketch with the following parameters: 3.2. Extrude depth towards normal: 0.0 3.3. Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0833 3.4. Sketch scale: 0.1667 3.5. Operation: Cut the existing solid body. The final dimensions of the assembly are approximately 3 units in length, 2 units in width, and 1 unit in height.</description>

Each sketch can contain multiple faces. In this case, we have only one face (Face 1) with one loop (Loop 1) that contains four lines (Lines 1-4). Extrusion Extrude the sketch in both directions along its normal vector. Set the extrusion depth towards the normal to 0.1544. Set the extrusion depth opposite the normal to 0.1544 as well.
